thobe.widgets.splitPanel

Class SPSubFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • thobe.widgets.splitPanel.SPFrame
      • thobe.widgets.splitPanel.SPSubFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SPComponentDecoratorListener, SPContentSwitchListener

    public class SPSubFrame
extends SPFrame
implements SPComponentDecoratorListener, SPContentSwitchListener
    A class that represents the leaf of the composite design-pattern. This special node hold a reference to the subframe of the SplitPanel that will be visible. This type of node will be used to be able to build up the tree that represents the hierarchy of the subframes of the SplitPanel.
    Author:
    Thomas Obenaus
